fields.headline: Bar of the week
fields.bodyText: Barely altered since the beginning of the last century. Every square inch of flock wallpaper is covered with boxing memorabilia, vintage hurling shirts and photos of entertainers past and present. The gym upstairs has seen a number of world champs pounding the bag. The only bar that serves Brains SA, known locally as 'Skull Attack', from the keg - £1 a pint to pensioners. High point: Victorian charm. Low point: the long walk from the town centre. Beer: Brains £1.66. G&T: £2.14. House wine: glass £1.40. Food: baps. Music: standard jukebox sounds. Popular with: local drinkers, R&B devotees. Best for: experiencing a pub that time forgot.
